name: product-support-now
author: Frank Ortiz

sections.description:
Integrate WhatsApp support dialog directly into your Woocommerce store and that will help you to increase leads/sales from your website. this is well design with lightwight code help to attract users for chat with active agent using WhatApp application.

Available fields

  • whatsapp1
  • whatsapp2
  • whatsapp_active_turn
  • icon_color
  • background_color
  • text_color
  • text_size
  • text_label
  • start_message
  • schedule_turn
  • active

Usage

Navigate to the plugin documentation if you need more information on how to use this plugin.

Support

Find help in our support plaftorm for this plugin.
sections.installation:
Installation

  1. In your WordPress admin panel, go to Plugins > New Plugin
  2. Find the product-support-now plugin by Frank Ortiz and click Install now
  3. Alternatively, download the plugin and upload the contents of product-support-now.zip to your plugins directory, which usually is /wp-content/plugins/
  4. Activate the plugin
  5. Enjoy

Usage

Go to the plugin’s documentation for information on how to use it.
sections.faq:
No limitation for the Free version

The free version of the product-support-now is not limited.

What if I need some speficial customization?

Just contact me and we can discuss about any new great feature.

Usage

Go to the plugin’s documentation if you need more information on how to use this plugin.

Support

Find help on our support plaftorm for this plugin.

short_description: Add a link to web-whatsapp chat on each product, with information about the product. It allows asign the work schedule up to 2 employees.
